sentences.sContent: Here, prisoners and their instructor get down during a music class.
sentences.sContent_eng: Here, prisoners and their instructor get down during a music class.
sentences.sCn: 这儿服刑人员和他们的导师正在一起上音乐课。

sentences.sContent: I walk with Helen. Laura hugs me apologetically and runs off to her music class at the other end ofthe building.
sentences.sContent_eng: I walk with Helen. Laura hugs me apologetically and runs off to her music class at the other end ofthe building.
sentences.sCn: 我和海伦一起走，罗拉带歉意的拥抱了我一下就跑去另一幢楼去上音乐课了。

sentences.sContent: Nothing says rehabilitation like rhythm. Here, prisoners and their instructor get down during a music class.
sentences.sContent_eng: Nothing says rehabilitation like rhythm. Here, prisoners and their instructor get down during a music class.
sentences.sCn: 没有人说，罪犯的改过自新后象音乐节奏。这儿服刑人员和他们的导师正在一起上音乐课。
